title: Man on the rim series
creator_credit: Quantum Films, Anthony Buckley and Robert Raymond
brief_description: Over two years in the making, this series about the Pacific Oceean, the people who live around it and across its vast expanse, has breathtaking photography and fascinating narration which illustrates that what we are learning about this area comes from the descendants of the original inhabitants.
creator_credit_for_label: Quantum Films, Anthony Buckley and Robert Raymond
